resources.string:
Before use this Application, you need to use adb tools to grant permission, copy below command and exec it on a PC:

%1$s

Or you can use root to grant permission.

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Normal display mode\nUse quick toggle to temporarily enable greyscale mode
Greyscale display mode\nUse quick toggle to temporarily enable normal mode
By pressing the toggle in your notification panel, you\'ll enable/disable the grayscale mode by the selected amount of time

This app has been made by Fabio Rosada and all the arts were made by Natalia Petliak.

You can find the source code on GitHub https://github.com/BerenLuth/Greyscale

This app is a fork of Grayscale app made by Fei-ke, you can find code at this link https://github.com/fei-ke/Greyscale
Quick toggles are placed on the top of the notification panel.\nUsually there\'s a button to edit them, there you\'ll be able to find and add the greyscale toggle.
